text: Kris Kelmi (real name Anatoli Arievich Kelmi (; «Старый волк» Крис Кельми не промахнулся 21 April 1955 – 1 January 2019) was a Soviet and Russian rock and pop musician and composer.Un músico ruso denuncia que fue atacado por un grupo de budistas en Tailandia // Russia Today He was a member of the musical groups Leap Summer and Autograph.Slavic and East European Arts His most well-known songs: Night Rendezvous, Closing the Ring,Лолита Милявская предложила почтить память Криса Кельми, исполнив его хит «Замыкая круг» // Komsomolskaya Pravda and Tired Taxi.Крис Кельми в проекте «МедиаМетрикс» Kelmi was born in Moscow. He died on 1 January 2019 from cardiac arrest caused by alcoholism at his home in Moscow Oblast at the age of 63.Названа причина смерти Криса Кельми // lenta.ru ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Russian composers Category:Musicians from Moscow Category:Russian singers
title: Kris Kelmi
